html:
5.25.17  7:06 pm   What are your guilty pleasures? Do you even have any guilty pleasures, or are you open about everything you enjoy?

     existing

5.25.17  6:50 pm   How much musical training have you had?

     a life time's worth

5.25.17  6:30 pm   what is the video time mop

     it's a video i did for my instrumental recording 'time mop' which was done several years before
5.25.17  6:17 pm   I'm sure someone's already asked this but how do you have time to answer all these questions?

5.25.17  5:41 pm   Have you considered making a deleted scenes video for your "history of the entire world, i guess" video?

     there are no deleted scenes
5.25.17  5:25 pm   if you have 4 pencils and i have 7 apples, how many pancakes will fit on the roof?

5.25.17  5:19 pm   "The beginning of purpose is in creating something that only you understand." Do you think that quote is accurate?

     sure. that makes sense
5.25.17  5:09 pm   How do you keep track of the same questions people ask?Like the "hey look this is a statement" one.

5.25.17  4:56 pm   do you think guys should be allowed to wear make-up

     they are
5.25.17  4:53 pm   what is your daily routine like?
5.25.17  4:38 pm   why does it say ueqstions?

5.25.17  4:06 pm   what is the capital of outlandia?

     bumfuck

5.25.17  3:52 pm   Is it true that you hate music?

     no

     Why?

5.25.17  2:56 pm   any thoughts on why certain collections of evenly-spaced notes sound so unstable? like how can whole tone scales, and augmented triads, and fully diminished 7th chords, and tritones all be used to make you wonder where the hell you are?

     it's kind of like rotating. going up a whole step rotates you a little bit to the right. going up a minor third rotates you back to the left. if you keep spinning in the same direction you get dizzy

5.25.17  2:52 pm   Do you still love music?

     oh hell yeah

      is there passion left?

     there is even more than before

5.25.17  2:33 pm   How many takes does it take a take to take takes?

     usually 1 take per take

5.25.17  2:33 pm   How many questions have you asked yourself?

     surely millions

5.25.17  2:22 pm   why did you threw away your wallet, keys, phone, shoes and the instrument that you play

     i did not

5.25.17  2:11 pm   What is your political ideology? Are you more left-winged or right-winged?

     it's difficult to fly unless you use both wings

5.25.17  1:32 pm   How are you able to express your thoughts and feelings in such a raw way?

     the trick is to start out by doing it in a much rawer way, and then just keep doing it until it starts to make just enough sense

5.25.17  1:05 pm   Hi bill wats up im currently having issues with removing my socks so it would be lovely if you came over to my house and helped me take them off. thanks -Ken

     right now i don't think i have time

5.25.17  12:41 pm   do you hate life

     no

5.25.17  12:28 pm   Will you consider running for president?

     i don't think that's a good use of my time

5.25.17  11:38 am   do you know a cure for boredom

     yes, financial hardship

5.25.17  11:36 am   can you help me? i have some good ideas for songs and stuff but i'm not very good at music theory and i'm having real problems writing out the rhytm. the notes are fine, but i have really bad problems writing out rhythms, and i can't choose the time signature. any tips? thabk you

     writing it on paper might not be necessary. use a voice recorder to demonstrate how it goes

5.25.17  11:25 am   how to tell a friend you like her and not be weird?

     i think the only way that works is if you both tell each other at exactly the same time

5.25.17  9:51 am   can you confirm that the world is indead flat?

     that's not exactly how i would describe it
5.25.17  9:36 am   hey look this is a statement!!!!

5.25.17  8:47 am   it's been 2 days now wtf bill

     since what

5.25.17  8:44 am   do you prefer shoes or toothpaste?

     they are both good for different purposes

5.25.17  8:26 am   Have you ever considered making videos?

     yes

5.25.17  8:11 am   hi bill, i've seen all your videos, listened to all your songs, in a sense i'm "used to" your sound and sense of composition, but in HOTEWIG when the microscopic specks multiply, that sound and pace really suprprised me (in a good way). any comment on that particular thing ? thanks

     in the temp narration, i just made a "shw shw" swish sound, vocally, as a place holder, for timing purposes. and then when i was doing the score i realized that that sound is pretty much already the right sound. so i just added some FM boingies on top of that, but i kept the vocal sound from the temp in there

5.25.17  8:09 am   how do you come up with your analogies? do you have to think hard about it or does it just come naturally?

     sometimes it's fun to try one that seems all wrong, just to see if it works

5.25.17  8:08 am   Your videos are funny but extraordinary.I would like to know if you have tried to deliver some meaningful messages to the viewers.Or you just made them for fun?

     meaning is fun for me, and fun is also very meaningful. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.25.17  7:46 am   knock knock, who's there?

     you, i think

5.25.17  7:41 am   favourite pink floyd song?

     the one where they get wicked high and play Emin and A for an hour

5.25.17  7:32 am   Do you do all the editing in your videos yourself?

     yes

5.25.17  7:17 am   Is magic real and are miracles real and which is more real out of the two?

     the entire world we live in is a miracle, of magic. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.25.17  7:16 am   what are you doing when you aren't working on the current project?

     sleeping

5.25.17  7:01 am   how do we pressure you to answer our question?

     likely the same way you can pressure me to make history videos of every country and write jingles for your company and collaborate with your tv network and make 500 more reality videos and do songs every day and do anagrams every day and do tweets every day and do instagrams every day and do monday videos and respond to every email while also being on tour doing meet and greets and translate my videos into every language and make versions without the words you don't like and make t-shirts

5.25.17  6:57 am   Should you answer every question?

     that would only be possible if i did nothing besides answer questions 24 hours a day

5.25.17  5:44 am   explain the concept of time to me

     it's scenarios playing out. it's like when nothing ever happens and everything is permanently the same forever, and you're just like "damn i could sure use some SCENARIOS" so you think of some scenarios. 'time' means how far you are through the scenario

5.25.17  5:38 am   bill there's an inconsistency about you that is bugging me. your content has a very self-deprecating feel and it promotes you as some depressed, confused with the world individual.

     i disagree but i respect your opinion

     a lot of your content on yt is like this.

     i think the majority of it is not sad nor confused. but i respect your opinion

     Yet, in these questions you make it clear that none of that is true. You're not sad and depressed and are actually very driven and productive. is the self deprecating personna just for show? is it because the internet likes that kind of humour so you make it like that? Im really perplexed by the whole thing
5.25.17  4:53 am   do you like dank memes? if so, what is your favourite "maymay"
5.25.17  2:53 am   do you know that you wrote thabk you in the page that appears after we asked questions?

5.25.17  2:15 am   Which were you thinking of more while making the "seljuk turks jingle", it being in 3, with the byzantines screaming as beat one of the next bar, or "seljuk turks" being in 4 with the scream on the fourth beat?

     i would hear it in 4. i actually never considered the scream to be part of the jingle, but i guess you could

5.25.17  1:33 am   how do you get over someone that hates you?

     leave them alone
5.25.17  12:15 am   what is your least favorite word
5.24.17  11:53 pm   what is your opinion of opinions?

5.24.17  11:39 pm   are you very self critical of your own work

     yes

      and has it ever stopped you from writing songs,

     not writing. recording yes

      if yes then what is a good strategy for dealing with that please?

     get chased by bears
